description: The .950 JDJ is a powerful large caliber rifle cartridge developed by American gunsmith and weapon designer J. D. Jones of SSK Industries. Not very many were made due to the sheer size and recoil of the ammo not to mention the cost. As of 2014 SSK Industries stopped manufacturing this ammo.
//: It's said that the .950 JDS produces 277 foot pounds of recoil energy and said to feel like shooting ten 30-06 rounds at once, leaving a dinner plate sized bruise.

description: An empty casing from a .950 JDJ round make sure to keep it as it's extremly rare..
